backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a calculator with add, subtract, multiply, and divide operations, each storing results in a capped 10-entry calculation history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the app rename to 'Study Calculator' is implemented in frontend/index.html and frontend/src/App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS with OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point setting the browser tab title to 'Study Calculator' and mounting the React app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React layout rendering a dark header with 'Study Calculator' branding and on-chain indicator, the Calculator component, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Calculator.tsx: Main calculator component managing digit, operator, decimal, and equals input state, keyboard listeners, and dispatching backend arithmetic mutations via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorDispla: Display component rendering the current expression and result with neon-green styling, scanline overlay, animated loading dots, and red error state.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorHistor: Scrollable history panel displaying up to 10 past calculations with click-to-reuse, loading skeletons, and an empty state illustration.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorKeypad: Defines and renders a 4-column calculator keypad grid with buttons for digits, operators, clear, backspace, decimal, and equals, each styled with oklch colors and hover/press animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching calculation history and performing add, subtract, multiply, and divide mutations against the backend actor, invalidating history on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind layers, defines CSS custom properties for the dark calculator theme, and adds utility classes for neon glow effects and button press animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with oklch-based semantic color tokens, custom calculator-specific colors, Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing implemented features (calculator UI, dark theme, app rename), and pending feature requests (backend arithmetic and history) with their requirement IDs and statuses.
